{{ item.item_name }}

Discount {{ item.item_discount }}%

{{ item.id == ActiveIdMulti ? 'Added' : 'Add To Cart' }}

₹ {{ item.item_price }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ItemServiceService } from 'src/app/services/item-service.service'; import { ToasterService } from 'src/app/services/toaster.service'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.scss'] }) export class ContentComponent implements OnInit { itemList: any; IsLogin: any; ActiveId : any; ActiveIdMulti:any; constructor(private IS: ItemServiceService, private userS: UsersService, private toaster:ToasterService) { } ngOnInit() { this.getItems(); } getItems() { this.IS.getItems().subscribe((res: any) => { this.itemList = res.Result; }) } AddToCart(item: any) { // Call API to add item to cart if user is logged in let user = localStorage.getItem("user") let user_id = user && JSON.parse(user).data.id; let addData = { ...item, user_id } if (user) { this.IS.addToCart(addData).subscribe((response:any) => { this.ActiveId = response.data.item_id; this.cartData(); this.toaster.AddToCartSuccess(); },(err)=>{ this.toaster.AddToCartFail(); }); } if (!localStorage.getItem("user")) { // Retrieve existing data from LocalStorage or create a new empty array let existingData: any = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("MyItems") || "[]") as string[]; // Add the new object to the existing array existingData.push(item); // Save the updated array to LocalStorage localStorage.setItem("MyItems", JSON.stringify(existingData)); this.IS.cardData.emit(existingData) this.toaster.AddToCartSuccess(); this.IS.PendingdataAddedLocalToDb(item).subscribe((res: any) => { this.ActiveId = res.data.item_id; }) } // Retrieve the data from local storage let data:any = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ActiveAdded') || "[]") as string[]; data.push(item.id); // Store the updated array back to local storage localStorage.setItem('ActiveAdded', JSON.stringify(data)); this.ActiveIdMulti = data; console.log(this.ActiveIdMulti); } cartData() { let user = localStorage.getItem('user'); let userId = user && JSON.parse(user).data.id; this.IS.getCartDataByUserID(userId).subscribe((res: any) => { this.IS.cardData.emit(res.data); }) } }
